newsitem.title: CHINA: China auto industry output up 3.9 pct in Jan-Feb.
newsitem.headline: China auto industry output up 3.9 pct in Jan-Feb.

text.p: Output of China's automotive industry increased by 3.9 percent in the first two months of this year compared with the year-ago period, figures from the State Statistical Bureau showed on Wednesday.
In January-February, China manufactured 233,500 motor vehicles, including 100,500 trucks, up 3.9 percent compared with the same period last year, it said.
China turned out about 13,000 large tractors, representing an 8.4 percent increase. Output of small tractors dropped by 23.3 percent, it said.
